name: Hyper Active
overview: Essentially a Defender style shooter by Tony Pomfret. The bars represent the radar shield (if it reaches zero, the radar will stop working), the auto-fire, and the player's life. The moons of the planet Mughal have been attacked by unknown forces. New defense and interception systems are being tested on these moons are now in danger. Equipped with a spacesuit, you will have to retrieve the system capsules by returning them to the underground storage. After securing the capsules of one sector, it'll be time to take on the next. Published in Italy as Super Active in Super Game 2000 Nuova Serie, Supplementi Edigamma/pubblirome - top (1988) and Special Games n.19 (dicembre 1988). It was also released as a Commodore User cover tape in February 1989, named Hyperactive (all one word) on that release.
